profile.name: David M. Walker
profile.title: Full Stack Engineer
profile.summary: Experienced Full Stack IT Professional with more than 18 years including full life-cycle software design, development, configuration, administration, continuous integration and delivery. I enjoy front-end, back-end and devOps development. Every problem is an opportunity to learn, a chance to grow, and a solution waiting to be discovered.
